summary: FOR THE 3RD TIME, THE WINDOW OF MY 2007 JEEP LIBERTY HAS STOPPED WORKING AND IS DROPPING INTO THE DOOR!  IN FACT, AT THIS MOMENT, THE DRIVER SIDE FRONT AND REAR WINDOWS ARE DROPPING INTO THE DOOR AND THE MOTOR WILL NOT WORK.  THE FIRST TIME IT HAPPENED TO MY DRIVER SIDE FRONT WINDOW, THE CAR WAS UNDER WARRANTY.  NOW IT IS NOT AND I AM MAD!!!!!  CHRYSLER JEEP NEEDS TO DO A RECALL ON THIS PROBLEM, FIX ALL WINDOWS ONCE AND FOR ALL SO WE HAVE PEACE OF MIND WHILE WE DRIVE! *TR
